description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The creators of Golden Royal Blackjack present a fast-paced, multi-player game that combines Slots, Scratch-off Tickets, and Bingo.  In 10 rounds, match shapes from the slot machine's spin to the lottery tickets. Match fast! The timer is ticking. Match all the shapes on a ticket and it flips over for you scratch for a prize. The top score wins. Features 20 in-game Awards to earn. Version 1.2
